title: 건강한 생활 조언
description: 건강한 생활 습관에 대한 조언과 규칙이 담긴 글을 읽고 이해합니다.

passage.text:
Living a healthy life is important for everyone. Here are some tips that can help you stay healthy and happy.

First, you should exercise regularly. You don't have to go to the gym every day, but you must move your body for at least 30 minutes daily. You can walk, run, swim, or play sports. When I was younger, I could play basketball for hours without getting tired. Now, I try to exercise at least three times a week.

Second, you must eat healthy food. You should eat lots of fruits and vegetables. You shouldn't eat too much fast food or sugar. It may be difficult to change your eating habits, but it will make you feel better.

Third, you should get enough sleep. Adults should sleep for 7-8 hours every night. Without enough sleep, you might feel tired and stressed. When you're tired, you can't focus well on your work or studies.

Fourth, you must drink plenty of water. You should drink at least 8 glasses of water per day. Water can help your body work properly and keep your skin healthy.

Finally, you should reduce stress. You could try meditation, yoga, or spending time with friends and family. Everyone needs time to relax.

Remember, you don't have to be perfect. Start with small changes. You may find it challenging at first, but don't give up. Your health is the most important thing!
